thread.section_title: Giant Vintage Sunglasses Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Giant Vintage Sunglasses | www.giantvintage.com | 3 of 102
thread.title: Sarah H
thread.title_full: Giant Vintage Sunglasses reviewed by Sarah H

author: Sarah H
title: Sarah H
text:
My glasses came from all the way across the country in just a couple of days (over the weekend, too!) and they look exactly the way I expected them to.
Also, they put tootsie rolls in the package! What a surprise!
I loved the selection and the quick send. Definitely recommend!!
